      • JBHtmlEditorKit

        public JBHtmlEditorKit(boolean noGapsBetweenParagraphs,
                       boolean disableLinkedCss)
        Parameters:
        disableLinkedCss - Disables loading of linked CSS (from URL referenced in <link> HTML tags). JEditorPane does this loading synchronously during JEditorPane.setText(String) operation (usually invoked in EDT).
